Name: Realm of Khaos
About the game: Realm of Khaos is an action platformer with a taste of science fiction . Players can fight randomly spawning enemies as more spawn throughout the level. Shoot the enemies and kill as many as you can! Try to survive for as long as you can or maybe choose to fight the boss! Play as Marine-001 firing lasers and plasma charges, mowing through enemies as they come at you. ※Additional characters are planned to be added in a later update if enough users wish to see an update. The laboratory researching about the Realm of Khaos has been taken over by the creatures of the Khaos Realm. Fight your way through the enemies and get to the boss to activate the portal to the Khaos Realm! ※Khaos Realm levels are planned to be added in a later update if enough users wish to see an update.
Developers: Chase Yamaguchi,Eric Bennatte,Patwoneque Bradley,Frangelica Terry,Kasey Ray
